comment: Equivalent of Axiom of Choice. ` B ` is a collection ` B ( x ) ` of nonempty sets. Remark after Theorem 10.46 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 98. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.)
